{{ title }}

Add dropdown behaviour to sidebar submenus for screens larger than 767px wide. On smaller screens, the menus will automatically convert to collapse menus.

  • Usage
  • Demo
To create a dropdown sidebar menu, add the data-toggle="sidebar-dropdown" attribute to any .sidebar-menu-button element, immediately followed by a .sidebar-submenu.
